entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stop using Socket directly in HttpConnection #63710
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostOptions.ShutdownTimeout` default value of 5s is too short #63709
  • [question] Correct JIT flag for sequence point capture with release optimizations #63708
  • ICloneable with generics support #63707
  • Occasional timeouts in HttpConnectionPool.ConnectAsync #63706
  • Code cleanup of Vector/64/128/256 #63704
  • [wasm] Do not print mono_wasm_runtime_ready to console #63703
    7.0.0
  • AllowRenegotiation is ignored on Linux #63699
  • [Android][TimeZone] Backward TimeZone IDs found in Android tzdata #63693
    6.0.MAUI
  • Add IEquatable<T> to public Equals-overriding value types to enable CA1066/1067 #63687
    7.0.0
  • Developers can customize the JSON serialization contracts of their types #63686
    7.0.0
  • Fix ConnectTest.ConnectAsync_PassNoSubProtocol_ServerRequires_ThrowsWebSocketException on NodeJS #63681
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.22060.9] UMLGenerator generate unexcepted UML due to Regex.IsMatch return wrong result #63678
  • Custom JsonConverter is ignored on [FromQuery] action parameter in ASP.NET #63677
  • Different behaviour during SSL handshake between Windows and Linux #63676
  • Fix AbortTest.Abort_ConnectAndAbort_ThrowsWebSocketExceptionWithmessage on NodeJS #63673
  • Fix ConnectTest.ConnectAsync_CancellationRequested**Connect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException on NodeJS #63672
  • Fix ConnectTest.ConnectAsync_CancellationRequestedAfterConnect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException on NodeJS #63671
  • Q: AOT and composite type reflection #63670
  • [wasm][debugger] Refactor tests to reduce dedicated test classes number #63667
  • Consider adding SslStream.Connect #63663
  • GetClientCertificateAsync can fail with exception about corrupted frame #63662
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext reports null/notnull for unspecified generic parameters #63660
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\suppressfinalize\\suppressfinalize.cmd #63658

Closed

  • ASP.NET 4.8 EventCounter does not contain methods #58408
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'false' in 'System.DomainNameHelper:IdnEquivalent(System.String):System.String' during 'Early Value Propagation' (IL size 127) #63610
  • Unable to get acceptableIssuers from LocalCertificateSelectionCallback #52499
    7.0.0
  • Recurring test failures in tracing due to class loader alloc tracker heap corruption #57461
    7.0.0
  • RuntimeHandles should implement IEquatable #62944
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols - Linux - Port 389 not working on specific LDAP host #63684
  • Checked JIT: "BBF_HAS_IDX_LEN is not set" assert #61705
    7.0.0
  • Segfault with net6.0 self-contained on linux-arm #60686
  • .NET 6.0.1 coreclr.dll symbols unavailable #62998
    7.0.0
  • System.Collections.Tests Fails on Android #50880
    7.0.0
  • Memory leak related to OptionsMonitor<LoggerFilterOptions> and Serilog #63578
    Future
  • Behavior of dependency resolution #63617
  • AssemblyLoadContext cannot unload DLL module in .NET 6.0 #63615
  • System.Data.Tests.AppDomainsAndFormatInfo.Bug55978 test failed #62965
    7.0.0
  • The mscordbi.dll .NET 5.0.13 is missing from symbol servers. #62939
    7.0.0
  • Setting COMPlus_EnableHWIntrinsic=0 causes System.PlatformNotSupportedException with optimized libraries code #60035
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce Activity.IsStopped Property #63713
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0
  • Increase default HostOptions.ShutdownTimeout value to 30 seconds #63712
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Add negative tests for all by-refs in UnmanagedCallersOnly scenarios. #63711
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Apply changes on wasm using sdb protocol. #63705
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63702
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/6.0] [source-build][mono] Do not build Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoTargets.Sdk #63701
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono
  • [Group 6] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.UserSecrets` #63700
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Don't reuse registers in Edit-n-Continue mode #63698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty(string) #62628 #63697
    community-contribution
  • [Draft] Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve reductions for Regex empty / nothing nodes #63695
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json` #63694
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add ActivityContext.TryParse overload #63692
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0
  • Enable superpmi-collect pipeline on macOS arm64 #63691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement IEquatable<T> on value types overriding Equals (and enable CA1066/CA1067) #63690
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Extremely experimental, possibly criminal, workaround for #60234 #63689
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change non-breaking spaces (U00A0) to a plain space in code files #63688
    community-contribution
  • Add public constants for HMAC and hash sizes #63685
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [wasm] Initial templates implementation #63683
  • Bump to macOS 10.14 minimum in libs and mono builds too #63682
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for StepThroughAttribute #63679
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Improve Directory.Move and DirectoryInfo.MoveTo #63675
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Avoid allocating byte array when setting ALPN list on Linux #63674
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add NativeAOT libraries tests annotations #63668
  • Add ProcessLinkerXmlBase to NativeAOT #63666
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for ref field support #63659
    area-Meta

Merged

  • fix LocalCertificateSelectionCallback on unix #63200
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • [source-build][mono] Do not build Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoTargets.Sdk #61607
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Re-enable System.Net.Security UnitTests project on Android #63669
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Update bbFlags after replacing RET_EXPR #63657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable MemoryMappedFileTests failing on macOS/arm64 + coreclr due to too long path #63438
    area-System.IO
  • #50880 remove exclusion line for collection tests #63616
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix a bug in the detection of Windows Nano from native test clients. #63656
    test bug, area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reuse ARRAY_SIZE from minipal #63661
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix index in XmlQueryRuntime.MatchesXmlType #63366
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix ArgIterator::GetArgLoc by-ref check for HFAs/HVAs #63587
    arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • Make test System.Data.Tests.AppDomainsAndFormatInfo.Bug55978 more robust #63028
    area-System.Data, 7.0.0
  • Add dependency analysis documentation from CoreRT #63665
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Capture and record output from tests from Console.Out into the test results #63606
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Convert RuntimeAssembly icalls to use QCallAssembly/ObjectHand… #63558
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Use open StrongNameKeyId for ILVerification.dll #63583
    area-ILVerification
  • [Perf] Enable LLVM on perf runs #63504
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix address mode for `IconHandle + Icon` #63608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify JIT/Methodical/eh/common and JIT/jit64/eh/common #63597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure the JIT view of InstructionSets is correct in the face of JitConfig switches #62420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `CEEInfo::IsCompilingForNGen` #63613
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary string allocation in HttpRuleParser.GetHostLength #63641
    area-System.Net.Http
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Remove constraints from Regex source generator partial class declaration #63637
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [DRAFT][wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Validate behavior of ProcessInfo command before and after suspension point #63382
    test enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Load assets earlier #63623
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Allow Delegate and MulticastDelegate marshalling #63219
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Throw PNSE for unavailable network information #63633
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Arm64] Don't use D-copies in CopyBlock #63588
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-codeflow
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [RateLimiting] Dequeue items when queuing with NewestFirst #63377
    area-System.Threading
  • Update SAN test to account for OpenSSL 3 changes #63655
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63596
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Build ILCompiler NuGet packages #63212
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing error after receiving loaded_files = null #63591
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    area-Build-mono
  • Delete `GT_DYN_BLK` #63026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Reconfigure the field sequences for statics #62632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Mark constant arguments of HWINTRINSIC nodes as DONT_CSE #63442
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce buffer size used in XmlReader when using Async mode #63459
    area-System.Xml, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create to properly analyze types with nested generic types #63556
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve static field access for NativeAOT #63620
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • API proposal implementation: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Hot Reload: initial push to support adding lambdas #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Build all packages when in source-build #63653
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #63546
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • 'cmeq' and 'fcmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question: ILScanner and Generics test #1783
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Can we produce package artifacts #1792

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Include clr.wasmjit subset when building on windows for x64 #1818

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] publish scenario for nativelib #1817

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workload feature band fallback doesn't work with workload update #23403
  • Workload feature band fallback doesn't work with rollback files #23402
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.22057.7]MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit failed to launch with BadImageFormat exception #23394
  • Package validation not working when PackageId is used #23393
  • Strange fallback RIDs #23390
  • MSBuild rebuild project when custom .target, .pros file modified #23388
  • Merge templating repo into SDK to simplify repo graph and merge runtime/system.commandline dependencies #23385
  • Automate the drop creation and insertion process for runtime and wasm workloads #23384
  • restore-toolset.* still referencing 6.0 RC2 #23383

Closed

  • With .NET 7 x86 SDK, Testhost process exited with error: It was not possible to find any compatible framework version #23362

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23404
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.2xx] Backport Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ (#23318) #23400
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • I noticed that another test handled this better so cleaning up the test code. #23231
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23347
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.2xx] Backport Catch dotnet watch task cancellation (#23316) #23386
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ #23318
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Fix typo in Strings.zh-Hans.xlf #22866
    Area-Infrastructure
  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080
    Area-Workloads
  • Allow print rollback when non-admin. #23326
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.3xx
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update man pages #23350
    Servicing-consider
  • Block loading the 7.0.100 SDK in 16.11 and below VS and MSBuild versions #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert to same version of System.CommandLine as 6.0.1xx. #23380
    Area-Workloads
  • Update application insights version #22974
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Checked Operators #4665
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Avoid synthesizing parameterless struct constructors #5552

PullRequests

Created

  • Never synthesize parameterless struct constructor #5637

Merged

  • Open questions for semi auto properties #5573

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidCastException from AbstractAddParameterCheckCodeRefactoringProvider`5.UpdateDocumentForRefactoringAsync #58811
  • BUG in VS2022 on Visual Basic code when click on Peek Definition doesn't show the element, shows the file where is declared at the first line. #58809
  • Intellisense doesn't suggest short attribute name on lambda parameters #58806
  • IDE0004 Unnecessary cast false positive #58804
  • Param-nullchecking doesn't work properly with formatting analyzer #58798
    17.2
  • Param nullchecking emit crash with async method #58796
    17.2
  • [Responsiveness] Roslyn [ackage load is causing MEF initialization on UI thread (80ms on opening solution) #58795

Closed

  • NullReferenceException in SyntaxInputNode.VisitTree #58647
    17.1
  • Implicit cast between type and function pointer #58718
  • IDE0044 or CS0266 - sbyte assignment via ternary operator and integer literal leaves you with no choice #58709
  • Array index from end in ValueTuple assignment throws IndexOutOfRangeException #58472
    17.1
  • GetTypeInfo() on a type in a foreach loses top level nullability #37309
    17.1
  • [Perf] RemoveUnnecessaryCast analyzer (IDE0004) #43304
    Backlog
  • Explore having the compiler itself issue a diagnostic for unnecessary casts. #50043
    Compiler.Next
  • Out of stack exception in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll #58751
  • Task list not working with VB.Net #58780
    17.2.P1
  • dotnet_analyzer_diagnostic.severity Does Not Work with TreatWarningsAsErrors #55541
    17.1
  • Severity changes made from Solution Explorer go into invalid section in global analyzerconfig #50444
    17.2.P1
  • Consider making Operation.ChildOperations public #49475
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Merge pull request #57132 from CyrusNajmabadi/branchId3" #58814
    Area-IDE
  • Readd GetTypesByMetadataName #58813
    Area-Compilers
  • Clarify breaking change requirement for constructor in 'struct' with field initializers #58812
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove formatting suppression for tuple syntax #58810
    Area-Compilers
  • avoid setting MICROSOFT_DIASYMREADER_NATIVE_* env variables in tests #58808
    Area-Compilers
  • Formatter #58807
    Area-IDE
  • Trigger global operation notification during solution close #58805
    Area-Analyzers
  • Handle synthesized delegates without refKinds #58802
    Area-Compilers
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers
  • Correctly set the VS.Core.Version property #58799
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58794
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58792
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add test showing case no longer repros #58791
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove contract check to avoid crash #58675
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.1.P3
  • Add tests for #37309 and #58472 #58752
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Fix metadata references declaration #58059
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Change the package feeds and remove the main-vs-deps #58801
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rename and share CompilerAnalyzerConfigOptions #58579
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Remove RecoverableTreeLengthThreshold option #58786
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Null annotate ParameterSymbol and derived #58700
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix failure to hook up TODO processing in-process #58797
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58803
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Handle /warnaserror with Warning analyzer bulk configuration in edito… #58460
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58793
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps back to main #58789
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Handle globalconfig files correctly in configuration code actions #58591
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers, Feature - Param Null Checking, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58816
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58815
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle more stack frames #58769
    Area-IDE
  • Perform progression search in two phases. #58785
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for lsp jsonrpc request handling #57834
    Area-IDE
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid allocations for .globalconfig parsing when possible #58725
    Area-Compilers
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Backport SpillSequence Fix to 17.1 #58788
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Cover additional cases in implicit object creation analyzer #57679
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cleanup Renamer.RenameDocumentAction API #58508
    Area-IDE
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Ide analyzer options #58765
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix foreach deconstruction nullability #52722
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Report AdditionalLocations for CS8618 (uninitialized non-nullable member) #58096
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Mark APIs as shipped #58776
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server behind reverse-proxy is case sensitive when app base path is changed #39469
  • Blazor virtualization can't work with `flex-wrap: wrap` and grid layouts #39468
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #39466
  • Feature request for SignalR: IHubClients.UsersExceptClients() #39462
    Backlog
  • Polymorphic binder on collection attempts to bind an extra element #39461
  • Expose ApiDescriptionProvider types and methods (so other projects can use it) #39459
  • Blazor's AuthorizeRouteView should allow for setting a different layout on the NotAuthorized content #39456
  • `CreatedResult` should accept null location #39454
  • Unable to run ASP.net Core 6.0 Web API on IIS 10 Windows Server 2019 #39452
  • blazor-devserversettings.json #39449
  • ElementReference.FocusAsync() does not focus a div with a tabindex in Blazor WASM #39448

Closed

  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • ContentDispositionHeaderValue should always add quotes to filename #39435
  • SignalR Core StartAsync() CancellationToken not respected? #39315
  • Using mvcBuilder.AddRazorRuntimeCompilation() causes slow first page load when porting asp.net core from .net 5 to .net 6 #39272
    6.0.x
  • Blazor NavigationManager additional features #39390
  • dotnet-install fails (local, CI) #39446
  • Analyzer: Warn that UseStartup/Configure and ConfigureWebHost isn't supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35814
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Why CascadingValue doesn't supported custom comparer? #39396
  • Improve console output of "dotnet watch" to make it clearer #35562
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies for dotnet 3.1 #39467
    area-mvc, 3.1.x
  • Use view buffers during pre-rendering #39465
    area-mvc
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies for dotnet 5 #39464
    area-mvc, 5.0.x
  • Enable warnings for IDE0062 #39463
    area-infrastructure
  • chore (package.json) : Update packages to latest #39460

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] Wrong Frame content sizes #4078

  • [Windows] Wrong positions using AbsoluteLayout #4075
  • [Android] Wrong positions using AbsoluteLayout #4074

Closed

  • The type or namespace name 'XXXXX' does not exist in the namespace 'XXXXXX' (are you missing an assembly reference?) BlazorHybrid (net6.0-maccatalyst), BlazorHybrid (net6.0-windows10.0.19041) #4060
  • FillAndExpand in a ScrollView triggers a layout loop #4097
  • Creating a Page using a DataTemplate does not support Dependency Injection #4072

PullRequests

Created

  • First pass at porting doc comments from Forms API docs #4099
  • View to Handler Converter for WinUI #4070
  • Use raster images with Android adaptive icons #4069

Merged

Updated
